content: the camellia cardigan is a beautifully textured crochet piece perfect for those who appreciate both style and comfort made with a plush cozy yarn this cardigan features a sophisticated textured stitch pattern that adds depth and visual interest to the fabric the design includes roomy front pockets and ribbed cuffs adding both functionality and a polished finish to the overall look with its relaxed fit and open front the camellia cardigan drapes effortlessly making it an ideal layering piece for cool mornings and chilly evenings there is a free version of this pattern on my website by purchasing this pattern here you re upgrading to the ad-free printable pdf download **what s included ** 8 page printable pdf download written instructions for women s sizes xs-5x photos for visual aid throughout the pattern size chart and schematic links to video stitch tutorials and a pattern walk through **pattern difficulty** intermediate **construction of garment ** cardigan is worked in 3 panels 2 front panels 1 back panel that are sewn together along the sides and at the top from there sleeves and trim are crocheted on to the panels optional pockets can then be crocheted and sewn on as well **yarn ** paintbox simply dk #3 **sizing & yardage ** finished circumference yardage xs -
